name: Strontium bromide
desc: Strontium bromide is a chemical compound with a formula SrBr2. At room temperature it is a white, odorless, crystalline powder. Strontium bromide burns bright red in a flame test. It is used in flares and also has some pharmaceutical uses.
Solubility:
soluble in alcohol
insoluble in ether
Other anions:
strontium fluoride
strontium chloride
strontium iodide
Other cations:
Beryllium bromide
Magnesium bromide
Calcium bromide
Barium bromide
Radium bromide
